meanings.definition: A type of fish found in North American freshwater lakes.
meanings.sent1: I saw a school of ciscos swimming gracefully in the lake.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen enjoy catching ciscos for their dinner.
meanings.sent3: Why did the ciscos bring a fishing rod to the party? They wanted to catch up with old friends!
meanings.sent4: The shimmering ciscos in the lake were like silver coins scattered in the water.
meanings.sent5: The glint of the ciscos' scales under the sunlight was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A company that specializes in networking hardware.
meanings.sent1: My uncle works at a ciscos company that makes routers and switches.
meanings.sent2: Businesses often rely on ciscos for their networking needs.
meanings.sent3: Why did the ciscos hire a clown? To improve their network's performance with some laughs!
meanings.sent4: The ciscos company built a bridge of connections between different offices.
meanings.sent5: The reliability of ciscos' products is unmatched in the industry.

meanings.definition: A type of computer operating system.
meanings.sent1: My new laptop runs on the latest ciscos operating system.
meanings.sent2: Tech enthusiasts eagerly anticipate the release of ciscos updates.
meanings.sent3: Why did the ciscos operating system go to therapy? It had too many bugs to work out!
meanings.sent4: Navigating through the ciscos interface felt like exploring a digital maze.
meanings.sent5: The efficiency of the ciscos OS made multitasking a breeze.
